title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-model, file upload, RAG, user auth).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem to chat, pull and manage Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with history, syntax highlighting and context management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Curated list of community-created Modelfiles for niche domains (finance, medicine, RPG, etc.).

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host a Discord bot that answers questions using any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama deployments (binaries + systemd services).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to run Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that threads replies using any Ollama model; supports app mentions and DMs.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package to integrate Ollama into mobile/desktop apps.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that brings local LLM assistance to your knowledge base.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with cross-compilation support.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama functions to MCP clients (Claude Desktop, etc.).
